senses.sense_definition: The light, elastic wood of the South American tree Aspidosperma excelsum, which is known for having a trunk that splits easily into planks.

examples.text: The local carpenter preferred using <w>paddlewood</w> for the project because of its unique elasticity and light weight.
Builders in the region often harvest <w>paddlewood</w> to create flat boards for constructing simple shelters.
